name: wildscreen.tv
overview:
Wildscreen.TV ::new generation quality broadcast:: The new source for watching and sharing videos in HD-Quality - about music, theatre, dance, art and creative shortfilm. Wildscreen.TV lets video creators cash in, not sell out and offers 100% Ad Revenue to their users if they place their own adverd on ther custom channel.

Factsheet: Based on an affiliate-ad-account of your choice you have full control & 100% income of your channel page.

-HD Resolution for your Quality video content -Embed your widgets: from other community sites into your channel -Embed your movies: hosted by wildscreen.TV into other websites -Privacy: Decide whether your film is publicly or privately broadcast -Networks: Find other filmmakers to further develop your projects -Community: Get involved in Compilations or create your own
